identity.name: RACK
identity.mission: To be the most trusted, minimalist fashion discovery platform for the modern consumer.

theme.strategy: High-trust minimalist. White space is the primary luxury signal. No gradients, no drop shadows unless extremely subtle.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles and hero text. Keep it tight and bold.

body.usage: High legibility for all informational text.

usage_rules.accent_color: Use #8DA399 (Muted Sage) ONLY for primary actions (Buttons) and subtle highlights. Do not overuse.
usage_rules.text_color: Headings must be #0A0A0A. Body text should be #404040 for softer contrast.
usage_rules.backgrounds: Main background is #FFFFFF. Use #F2F4F3 (Pale Sage Grey) for alternating sections (e.g., Testimonials, FAQ).

layout.grid_system: Use a 12-column grid. Max-width 1280px for main content.
layout.spacing: Generous. Section padding should be py-24 or py-32. Gap-8 minimum for grids.
layout.radius: rounded-none or rounded-sm (2px). Avoid large rounded corners to maintain a 'sharp' fashion editorial look.

buttons.style: Solid, sharp edges or slightly rounded (rounded-md).

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (#E4E4E7), no shadow. White background.
cards.hover: Subtle lift or border color change to #8DA399.

inputs.style: Minimal. bg-[#F9FAFB] border-transparent focus:border-[#8DA399] focus:ring-0 rounded-md h-12

navigation.layout: Logo left, Links center (hidden mobile), CTA right.

hero_main.alt: Minimalist fashion woman in white suit walking street
hero_main.position: Right side of hero or background with overlay

discovery_section.alt: Clean white clothing rack in minimal store

brand_trust.position: Partner section background or side image

visual_assets.icons: Use Lucide-React icons. Thin stroke (1.5px). Color: #0A0A0A.

hero.content: Headline: 'Discover Fashion. Curated.' Subhead: 'The premier discovery platform connecting you to the world's best retailers.' CTA: 'Join Waitlist'.

trust_signals.content: Trusted by leading affiliate networks and brands.

steps.title: Discover
steps.desc: Browse curated collections from top retailers.

steps.title: Compare
steps.desc: Find the best prices and styles in one place.

steps.title: Shop
steps.desc: Direct links to partner stores. No markups.

legal.note: Must be prominent in footer for compliance.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #404040 or darker on white backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent.1: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors defined above.
instructions_to_main_agent.2: Import Manrope and Inter fonts in index.css.
instructions_to_main_agent.3: Build the Landing Page using the 'Split Hero' layout.
instructions_to_main_agent.4: Ensure the 'Affiliate Disclosure' is visible in the footer (Critical for approval).
instructions_to_main_agent.5: Use the provided images. Do not use placeholders.
instructions_to_main_agent.6: Create the 'How it Works' section to clearly explain this is a DISCOVERY platform, not a store.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Keep it sharp (rounded-md max).
Ensure the site loads fast (optimize images).
